      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      buildRoute: Creates an array of waypoints that the aircraft will be initially given
      void Controls.checkSelected(int pointX, int pointY, Airspace airspace)
      checkSelected: Handles changing the selected flight and ensures that the flight is a valid selection Also makes sure that if two flights are intersecting that you only select one, not both
      void SeparationRules.checkViolation(Airspace airspace)
      checkViolation: Calculates whether two flights have breached the game over separation rules.
      EntryPoint FlightPlan.generateEntryPoint(Airspace airspace)
      generateEntryPoint: Creates the entry point for the flight
      void Controls.giveHeadingWithMouse(int pointX, int pointY, Airspace airspace)
      giveHeadingWithMouse: Handles updating the currently selected flights heading by clicking in it's control circle with the left mouse button
      void Waypoint.render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g, Airspace airspace)
      render: Render the graphics for the Waypoint class (Draws all Waypoints)
      void ExitPoint.render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g, Airspace airspace)
      render: Render method for the ExitPoint object, position determines orientation of image and String of name
      void SeparationRules.render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g, org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc, Airspace airspace)
      render: This calculates whether any flights in the airspace are breaking warning separation rules If two flight are breaking warning separation rules, a line is drawn between them.
      void SeparationRules.update(Airspace airspace)
      update: This calls the checkViolation method to detect whether the game over separation rules have been breached.
      void Controls.update(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc, Airspace airspace)
